Infoya is a pioneering consulting firm, collaborating with visionary leaders to achieve outsized business impact. We are focused on following areas of business transformation space:

Innovation serves as our starting point. We recognize that the landscape of technology is ever-evolving, presenting both opportunities and obstacles. By continually seeking out innovative solutions and exploring cutting-edge technologies, we position ourselves at the forefront of the industry, ready to address the unique needs and challenges faced by our clients.

Transformation follows closely behind. In today’s digital age, the ability to adapt and evolve is crucial for businesses seeking to thrive in a competitive landscape. At Infoya, we work hand-in-hand with our clients to facilitate transformative change, guiding them through strategic shifts in technology, processes, and culture that are essential for long-term success. 

Ultimately, our goal is to solve the problems that our clients face. Whether it’s streamlining operations, improving cybersecurity measures, or enhancing customer experiences, we leverage our expertise and experience to deliver practical, effective solutions that address the root causes of our clients’ challenges and drive tangible results. 

In summary, at Infoya, our approach to IT consultancy is guided by a clear and sequential process: we look for innovative solutions, transform our clients’ operations, and ultimately, solve the problems that stand in the way of their success.

SearchLabs is a leading specialist recruitment firm established to meet the recruitment needs of the Design, Construction & Property, and Information Technology industries.  Established in 2010, we work with the leading companies within our disciplines across North America & the Caribbean. 
 
At SearchLabs, we make hiring and job hunting as easy and simple as possible so you can focus on what you do best. We believe in the 80/20 rule. That 20% of companies come up with 80% of innovation in the industry, and 20% of talent do 80% of the work. We represent that 20%. 
 
When you partner with us, your personal career goals and objectives are dealt with and represented by experienced consultants within your field of specialty. We then match you to the best opportunities that are aligned with your goals and aspirations to result in a positive and rewarding outcome.
 
We recognize the importance of ethics and are committed to confidentiality in every step of the process. Whether you are looking for a permanent or contractual arrangement, we appreciate the responsibility and opportunity to represent and inform you about the marketplace and the career opportunities within.

For more information, please visit us at: https://searchlabs.ca/

data.description:
iLobby is an innovative SaaS-based facility and visitor management platform that’s become an integral part of day-to-day operations for companies in manufacturing, industrial, warehousing/logistics, airports, and other complex enterprises.   
 
The iLobby platform streamlines the management of visitors, contractors, temp workers, and deliveries with a convenient self-serve checkpoint. The platform significantly improves operational efficiency, while enhancing professionalism and branding. iLobby’s enterprise-level features make it easy to reach a high level of security and regulatory compliance in a matter of seconds, even in highly-regulated facilities.
 
Since becoming CEO of iLobby in 2017, Mr. Mashiyev has grown the platform into a global leader in the industry and has attracted major institutions and companies such as Canada Post, Toronto Pearson International Airport, Scotiabank, Manulife, Pepsi, Netflix, CBC, Unilever, LG, PCL Construction, and more. The Toronto-based company now operates in over 45+ countries and the platform has been translated into 30+ languages.

We’ve built an easy-to-use platform that ensures medical images get where they need to go, without relying on legacy image exchange systems, CDs or portals. By eliminating the need for networks, we seamlessly enable image exchange between any provider, patient or physician. And, by focusing on the patient experience & intelligently surfacing follow-up recommendations, we drive increased patient retention and satisfaction.

We’ve raised over $55M of capital and are trusted by more than 1.5 million patients across over 800 hospitals and imaging centers — including some of the largest health systems in North America. Learn more at pockethealth.com

data.description:
As the leader in ethically and sustainably sourced pet food, Open Farm believes that high quality nutrition, environmental stewardship, and animal welfare go hand in hand.  

Based in Toronto, Open Farm is one of the fastest growing pet food companies in North America and, as of July 2024, a certified B-Corporation. This accomplishment reflects our decade-long commitment to Doing Some Good for animals and the planet. 

We are on a mission to empower pet parents with high quality nutrition for pets, crafted from ethically and sustainably sourced ingredients. Open Farm offers a range of premium pet food products including dry and wet foods, bone broths, treats, freeze-dried raw, gently cooked meals, and nutritional supplements. Formulated with a focus on environmental stewardship, animal welfare, and transparent sourcing, Open Farm gives pet owners ethical and sustainable choices for their beloved companions.  

We're also proud of the strong partnerships with leading animal welfare and sustainability certifications including Global Animal Partnership, Certified Humane, Ocean Wise, and the Marine Stewardship Council.

data.description:
Votorantim Cimentos North America (VCNA) is a leading provider of cement, concrete and aggregates to construction customers in the Great Lakes region of the United States and Canada, and in the Northeast U.S. and Eastern Canada. Headquartered in Toronto, Ontario, we have 134 locations in North America, operating as St Marys Cement, Canada Building Materials (CBM), Prairie Materials, Superior Materials, and United Materials. Together, these companies provide jobs to more than 2,600 building materials employees. 

In addition to our North American presence, we are proudly part of an even bigger international picture. We operate as part of international building materials and sustainability solutions provider, Votorantim Cimentos, headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil and operating in all regions of the country. In total, Votorantim Cimentos has a presence on four continents in 11 countries: Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Canada, Luxembourg, Morocco, Spain, Tunisia, Turkey, United States and Uruguay. Together with other Votorantim portfolio companies, we have approximately 500 operating sites around the world with more than 40,000 direct employees. 

Established in 1936 in Brazil, Votorantim Cimentos’ rich, 86-year legacy has evolved over time as we seek sustainable growth and continued competitiveness through solutions and initiatives that generate a positive impact for the company and society.

We are made up of people and are an important part of peoples’ lives. From the ground up to the highest point of a city, we work together to build partnerships and lasting relationships. Our success is guided by our people, and we show our care and appreciation for employees by keeping inclusion and wellness at the forefront of everything we do. 

If you are looking for a career in the building materials industry, build it with us. Explore the other sections on this page to learn more about our company and discover the opportunities waiting for you at VCNA.

data.description:
RetiSpec is an AI-based company focused on early detection of neurodegenerative diseases through a simple eye exam. RetiSpec's proprietary AI solution leverages existing retinal imaging cameras to provide a non-invasive, accurate and scalable solution for the early detection of Alzheimer's disease. RetiSpec is involved in multiple Alzheimer's and brain health studies in leading hospitals and research networks throughout North America. 
RetiSpec is currently advancing its regulatory and market entry plans for its first clinically-validated test to predict amyloid burden at the point of care, to aid in the evaluation of individuals for Alzheimer's disease and other causes of cognitive decline. 
RetiSpec was recently selected from more than 75 global applicants to receive the Davos Alzheimer's Collaborative inaugural grant for Health System Preparedness to test its technology in optometry settings.

data.description:
The beauty industry caters to the youth. Makeup and skincare products are made for and tested on smooth skin, free of any texture or lines. Anti-aging products are pushed to 20-somethings, along with irrational fear. Smooth, flawless, airbrushed faces grace magazine covers, websites and ads. Women over 40 are very rarely represented. 

Somehow, this billion dollar industry has managed to make beauty synonymous with youth. And we’re taking a stand against that. 

Fièra Cosmetics launched in 2020 to provide those over 40 with makeup and skincare products specifically formulated for more mature skin. Our mission is to empower women to look and feel their best whether they’re 40 or 101. Our advertising puts these beautiful women into the spotlight, because for far too long, they have felt completely ignored and invisible by everyone in this industry.

We not only celebrate beauty at every age, we celebrate the true beauty of aging. We are proud to offer the highest quality products backed by science, and made safe for you and our planet. All of our products are paraben-free, non-GMO, fragrance free and also cruelty-free. We produce all of our products in the USA and currently serve all of North America.

Manga Hotel Group has been acquiring, investing in and operating hotels for almost four decades. Royal York Property Management is the premier property management and leasing company in Ontario, boasting an extensive portfolio of over 22,000 properties. What sets us apart is our unique offering of guaranteed rental income to landlords, ensuring peace of mind and financial stability. With a remarkable $10.1 billion in real estate assets under management, we stand as one of Canada's largest and most reputable property management firms. Additionally, our global presence is expanding and we now service 11 locations in Europe and over 40 locations in North America.

Our commitment to innovation drives our approach to property management. Leveraging our proprietary technology, we aim to disrupt the industry and enhance processes and systems. With over 20 strategically positioned offices across North America and Europe, we provide clients with local expertise and unwavering service delivery, as all departments operate 24/7.

At Royal York Property Management, we treat our clients' investment properties with utmost care, as if they were our own. Whether it's addressing maintenance concerns or conducting tenant showings, we consistently ask ourselves if we are meeting the standards we would set for our own properties. Our primary focus is to prioritize the needs of our clients and tenants, striving to achieve excellence every day.

Royal York Property Management goes above and beyond just rent collection. We are the only company in the industry that offers a genuine rental guarantee for our residential properties. Our confidence in our rigorous tenant placement process enables us to guarantee rent payment, cover legal expenses, and even replace tenants if they default on their rental payments during the agreed term.

InnerSpace is a space utilization platform that helps large enterprises make smarter decisions about their use of corporate real estate. Our powerful technology leverages a company's existing Wi-Fi infrastructure to provide unrivaled, multi-dimensional data without all the cost and effort needed for traditional sensor-based systems.

With recommendations for improved efficiency, productivity and employee satisfaction, our highly scalable solutions help turn your workspace into a competitive advantage.

Built for privacy and security, our platform is GDPR compliant as well as SOC 2 Type I and ISO-27001 certified. InnerSpace is proudly headquartered in Toronto, Canada. To learn more about us, visit our website at innerspace.io.

data.description:
We are all one big family at Just Like Family, and that is why we can deliver specialized senior home care in Canada in a different manner. The Just like Family brand stands for caring and loving caregivers that work closely with our clients and with the client’s family. We strive to be a helpful member of the family network by easing responsibilities as needed, opening lines of communications and offering methods of coping in times of struggle.

We understand the endurance that it takes to care for a loved one and continued duties outside of the home. Our caring staff offer 100% peace of mind.

We customize our care plans to your needs. We are familiar with all types of care and we offer your loved one’s dignity and independence as they progress through any challenges.

Our services include:

- Personal Care
- Companionship
- Overnight Care
- Home Support
- Respite Care
- Light Housekeeping
- Cooking/Meal Prep
- Post-Hospital Care
- Alzheimer's Care
- Dementia Care
- Disability Care
- Injury Care
- Palliative Care

Offering Home Care wherever you or your loved one lives with superior service that puts you first.

Our screened caregivers have extended experience in the healthcare field, several certified care aides, health care assistants or nurses.

Contact us for a free in-home assessment and receive a detailed care plan that can be tailored to current and future needs. Giving you peace of mind with support on your terms.
